entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
